mods:mods.note: Writer to Writer, the Process and Practice of Writing, was made possible by Florida First Coast Writers Festival and by Florida Community College at Jacksonville. The series was recorded from 1994 to 2005, and features a dynamic collection of writers interviewing other writers on their process and craft. The content of Writer to Writer represent the views of those being interviewed, and do not necessarily represent the opinions or view of Florida State College at Jacksonville.
